alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 6:06PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CUSTER COUNTY THROUGH 630 PM MDT... At 606 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Fairburn, or 26 miles south of Rapid City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Custer County, northeast of Fairburn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
